nodes.text: A holodrama, also known as a holofilm or holomovie, was a form of fiction entertainment created using holographic technology. As the name implied, the purpose of a holodrama was to present a dramatic story, rather than to document an actual event or present comedic scenarios. Creators of a holodrama would record their work onto a disk, which could be transmitted physically or via remote by way of a holoprojector.
